casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Sean Charles SPELL Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 2, 2017

Rachel M. Baird, in support of the petition.

Robert J. Scheinblum, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petition by American News and Information Services, Inc., and Edward A. Peruta for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court motion (AC 172273) is dismissed.
